Name: Pimm's Royale
Instructions: POUR Pimm's and orange curaçao into chilled glass and TOP with chilled champagne.
Review: Most recipes for this cocktail are merely Pimm's and champagne, but this mix is disappointing and a waste of champagne. Orange curaçao adds some much needed fruitiness, but even then, there are better cocktails and better ways to drink both Pimm's and champagne.
History: See our Fruit Cups and Pimm's page for more information.
Nutrition: One serving of Pimm's Royale contains 204 calories
